alert.note: Alert for Potter (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL POTTER COUNTY THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 31 miles south of Wellsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coudersport, Galeton, Denton Hill State Park, Cherry Springs State Park, Lyman Run State Park, Keating Summit, Austin, Sweden Valley and Ski Denton Ski Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
